_sText:
If you saw the movie, you can know some way of my map. I immited the Genetic lab, Research office, Arc chamber, Weapons lab, some room from the movie and other. My map does 7 min, some way for defend, very balanced for ct or zombie, no problem, no bug, map fixed, i think my map is good

v3 : I played on the server hellz.Fr and my map is good but need to fix, in this version, the bugs that i saw are now fixed, it's now good.
v3_2 : after to be tested on fog asso server, i removed some things for help zombie (too hard for them), enable a teleporter for the end, changing some timing.
